basics.name: Shrikant Sonone
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: He enjoys breaking complex technical scenarios and turns them into smaller working pieces. He completed Bachelors degree in Information Technology while doing freelancing. He believes that software architecture should be platform agnostic. Unless we want to reduce DevOps and maximize performance per buck. He believes that Open Source bring trust and transparency to the system. He enjoys Biryani and Technical discussion. Other than being a geek and doing hello world to newer technologies. He enjoys hitting road with his bike.

highlights: Build and Deploy Cloud native applications
Work closely with the offshore team to sync between tasks
Optimize applications to laverage scaling for cloud solutions
Architect solutions to handle progressive requirment changes.
Build and deploy web apps.
Work closly with the customer for requirments and feedback.
Build a solution which can handle intermediate level of traffic.
Host to an existing shared instance.
Optimize the solution to survive in low bandwidth condition.

publications.name: Compressed Image Manipulation and Replication over Cloud
publications.summary: Use Cloud to manipulate large scale/volume images by using a low bandwidth remote interface.

projects.name: SaaS Application

Enables Developer to add plugable modules to the infrastucture with minimal configuration

projects.name: eRFP Application

projects.name: Compressed Image Manipulation and Replication over Cloud

highlights: Local Search engine
